name: Think And Shoot 2
description:
Think And Shoot is about thinking, shooting and many more.

~

While in FPS view jump, run and shoot enemies!

Survive as long as you can and beat your score.

While in TOP view, put your mose over your enemies to check their life and type.

~

HOW TO PLAY

WASD to MOVE

Mouse to AIM

Left Click to SHOOT

LEFT SHIFT to RUN

~
